name: smallbooks
description: An application for finding and sharing short stories.

scripts.client-install: npm install --prefix client && npm i bootstrap reactstrap uuid react-transition-group --prefix client && npm i --save @fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core --prefix client && npm i --save @fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons --prefix client && npm i --save @fortawesome/react-fontawesome -- prefix client && npm i --save @fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons@prerelease --prefix client
scripts.server-install: npm i express mongoose concurrently nodemon

author: Jake Grafenstein
